channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: On the Eighth Tee
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Martin Brand)
item.description: Two golf caddies turned murderers, a pretty young girl --- and Lieutenant Jimmy Mersereau. Mix them together, stir well --- and you have a bit of exciting action.
